NewsItem.HEADLINE: RAN Expert INSIGHT 2017.4 Mobility Premium
NewsItem.SUMMARY: This strategic report illustrates the premium pricing charged by mobile operators for LTE data compared with fixed broadband data costs. Pricing for data is compared with operators' cost for data.
NewsItem.NEWSLINETEXT: This strategic report illustrates the premium pricing charged by mobile operators for LTE data compared with fixed broadband data costs. Pricing for data is compared with operators' cost for data.
NewsItem.KEYWORDS: WiMAX WiFI FWA LTE 5G NR 5GNR fixed wireless access cable mobile wisp market research forecast cpe cost to connect cost to pass mvno
